## **Datos**

Los datos son simulados pretenden representar los estudiantes un curso en UNSAM.

```{r}
#| include: false

library(readr)
mydata_mica <- read_csv("../data/student-dataset.csv")

```

Esto corresponde a *una muestra por conveniencia*

```{r}
#| include: false
nrow(mydata_mica)

```

Fueron 30 estudiantes

```{r}
mydata_mica$Weight_kg
mydata_mica$Height_cm
```

## Promedio

```{r}
mean(mydata_mica$Weight_kg)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
mydata_mica |>
  group_by(Gender)|>
  summarize(
    Peso = mean(Weight_kg)
  )
    
```

```{r}
mydata_mica |>
  group_by(Gender)|>
  summarize(
    Estatura = mean(Height_cm)
  )
    
```

```{r}
plot( mydata_mica$Weight_kg,  mydata_mica$Height_cm )
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
mydata_mica |>
  ggplot( aes(Weight_kg, Height_cm ))+
  geom_point()

```

```{r}
mydata_mica |>
  ggplot( aes(Weight_kg, Height_cm, colour = Preferred_Beverage ))+
  geom_point()

```

```{r}
table(mydata_mica$Preferred_Beverage)
```

```{r}
mydata_mica |>
  ggplot(aes(Preferred_Beverage ))+
  geom_bar()
  
```

```{r}
mydata_mica |>
  ggplot(aes(Preferred_Beverage, fill = Gender ))+
  geom_bar()
  
```
